LeOS - Full UnGoogled Apps

This repo includes ungoogled Apps without trackers. The Apps are forks. Some apps have only design changes, some have removed google sh..t, some have removed trackers and some have it all""

Currently it serves 40 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LeOS-GSI/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
AA 39 7A A3 D6 6D E4 AF 62 EB EF 24 0C 8D F6 0D 50 8F 5D A3 08 0F 79 A7 EA B9 7A 48 DC E2 CE 7D
